venue.name: Tri-County Regional Vocational Technical High School

item.description:
I'm speaking at Tech Day Camp again this year.  If you'd like to learn a lot about internet marketing in a very short time Tech Day Camp is for you. This year's camp is south of Boston in Franklin MA.  There is still an early bird rate in place (up to 3/17) -  check out the eventbrite link: http://techdaycamp.com/registration/

Seeya there

Lew


What is Tech Day Camp?

  • The largest gathering of Technology experts in the Tri-County area- Ever!!
  • It is a full day of workshops delivered by technology professionals.
  • It is Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Quickbooks, blogging & more for your business and personal use.
  • It is personal technology questions answered at the Tech Day Help Center.
  • It is learning how and what to do with your websites, photos and videos, effectual social media, and so much more.

Don't fight it...come to Tech Day Camp, the one day event to learn how technology can work for you!
http://techdaycamp.com/registration/
item.how_to_find_us: Tri-County Regional Vocational Technical High School - Franklin, MA
item.name: A Tech Day Camp Invitation to the Boston Internet Marketing Meetup
